description:
Have you been on the Internet? Stupid question, right? Well, everything on this magical network of tubes is actually built with HTML and CSS. Sure, there's lots going on in the background, but you'd better start off with the basics first!

In this course you will learn the basics of HTML and CSS. By the end of it, you will have completed two websites that you can show off, and you'll easily be able to create more of your own.

You will be learning in a project based environment. That means that you'll actually have to open up the text editor and follow along because we expect you to learn.
title: HTML & CSS From Scratch: Beginners Guide to Web Development
